definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="174" y="-96"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field></block><block type="controls_if" x="269" y="129"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_isriding"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">SPEED</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/particle minecraft:explosion ~0.5 ~-2 ~0.5</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/particle minecraft:flame ~0.5 ~-2 ~0.5</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></xml>
